thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Trevor Baldwin
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Trevor Baldwin

author: Trevor Baldwin
title: Trevor Baldwin
text:
Yes, I was pleasantly surprised when the Amazon Kindle arrived from CeX. Being second hand I was expecting it to be battered, damaged and well used. Instead it was thoroughly clean, in excellent condition and suitably well wrapped.
As a buyer, I would recommend checking their site out for an amazing round of available stuff.
